languages.text: {n}Уверенность {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}бывалого комиссара{/d} в вашем голосе заставляет сникнуть и побледнеть даже отчаянную бунтовщицу. Искренность вашего негодования служит лучшим доказательством вашей правоты.{/n} "Мы... изменники?... Святый Трон, неужели это правда? Но мы думали... Что же нам теперь делать?"

{n}Staggered by the confidence of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}battle-hardened Commissar{/d}, the woman loses her rebellious spirit and lowers her head, suddenly pale. The sincerity of your anger serves as the best possible proof that you are right.{/n} "We're... traitors? Blessed Throne, is it really true? But we thought... What are we supposed to do now?"

languages.text: {n}Vom Selbstbewusstsein eines {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}kampferprobten Kommissars{/d} beeindruckt, gibt die Frau ihre Aufsässigkeit auf und senkt leichenblass den Kopf. Die Aufrichtigkeit deine Zorns ist der beste Beweis, dass du recht hast.{/n} "Wir sind ... Verräter? Heiliger Thron, ist das wirklich wahr? Aber wir dachten ... Was sollen wir jetzt machen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Staggered by the confidence of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}battle-hardened Commissar{/d}, the woman loses her rebellious spirit and lowers her head, suddenly pale. The sincerity of your anger serves as the best possible proof that you are right.{/n} "We're... traitors? Blessed Throne, is it really true? But we thought... What are we supposed to do now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vom Selbstbewusstsein eines {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}kampferprobten Kommissars{/d} beeindruckt, gibt die Frau ihre Aufsässigkeit auf und senkt leichenblass den Kopf. Die Aufrichtigkeit deine Zorns ist der beste Beweis, dass du recht hast.{/n} "Wir sind ... Verräter? Heiliger Thron, ist das wirklich wahr? Aber wir dachten ... Was sollen wir jetzt machen?"

languages.text: {n}Stupéfaite par l'assurance d'un {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}commissaire aguerri{/d}, la femme perd toute envie de se rebeller et baisse la tête en pâlissant. La sincérité de votre colère est la meilleure preuve possible de la justesse de vos arguments.{/n} « Nous serions des... traîtres ? Par le trône béni, est-ce vrai ? Mais nous pensions... Qu'allons-nous faire, à présent ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Staggered by the confidence of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}battle-hardened Commissar{/d}, the woman loses her rebellious spirit and lowers her head, suddenly pale. The sincerity of your anger serves as the best possible proof that you are right.{/n} "We're... traitors? Blessed Throne, is it really true? But we thought... What are we supposed to do now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Stupéfaite par l'assurance d'un {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}commissaire aguerri{/d}, la femme perd toute envie de se rebeller et baisse la tête en pâlissant. La sincérité de votre colère est la meilleure preuve possible de la justesse de vos arguments.{/n} « Nous serions des... traîtres ? Par le trône béni, est-ce vrai ? Mais nous pensions... Qu'allons-nous faire, à présent ? »

languages.text: {n}Conmocionada por la confianza de {mf|un|una} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}{mf|comisario fogueado|comisaria fogueada}{/d}, la mujer sucumbe al desánimo y baja la cabeza, habiendo palidecido repentinamente. Tu furia genuina es la prueba definitiva de que tienes razón.{/n} «¿Somos... traidores? Por el Trono, ¿es eso cierto? Pero creímos que... ¿Y ahora qué va a ser de nosotros?».
languages.original_text: {n}Staggered by the confidence of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}battle-hardened Commissar{/d}, the woman loses her rebellious spirit and lowers her head, suddenly pale. The sincerity of your anger serves as the best possible proof that you are right.{/n} "We're... traitors? Blessed Throne, is it really true? But we thought... What are we supposed to do now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Conmocionada por la confianza de {mf|un|una} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}{mf|comisario fogueado|comisaria fogueada}{/d}, la mujer sucumbe al desánimo y baja la cabeza, habiendo palidecido repentinamente. Tu furia genuina es la prueba definitiva de que tienes razón.{/n} «¿Somos... traidores? Por el Trono, ¿es eso cierto? Pero creímos que... ¿Y ahora qué va a ser de nosotros?».

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}戦いに精通したコミッサー{/d}の威信に愕然とし、女は反骨精神を失うと、不意に青ざめて頭を下げる。あなたの心底からの怒りが、あなたの正しさを示す何よりの証拠だ。{/n}「私たちが…裏切り者？祝福された王座よ、本当にそうなの？だけど聞いてたのは…それで、これからどうすればいいの？」
languages.original_text: {n}Staggered by the confidence of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}battle-hardened Commissar{/d}, the woman loses her rebellious spirit and lowers her head, suddenly pale. The sincerity of your anger serves as the best possible proof that you are right.{/n} "We're... traitors? Blessed Throne, is it really true? But we thought... What are we supposed to do now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}戦いに精通したコミッサー{/d}の威信に愕然とし、女は反骨精神を失うと、不意に青ざめて頭を下げる。あなたの心底からの怒りが、あなたの正しさを示す何よりの証拠だ。{/n}「私たちが…裏切り者？祝福された王座よ、本当にそうなの？だけど聞いてたのは…それで、これからどうすればいいの？」

languages.text: {n}身为{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}久经沙场的政委{/d}，你自信的态度让那个女人震惊不已。她突然低下了头，脸色苍白，叛逆的思想荡然无存，因为你发自内心的愤怒便是你最好的证明。{/n}“我们是……叛徒？黄金王座在上，原来这才是真相吗？可我们以为……我们现在该怎么办？”
languages.original_text: {n}Staggered by the confidence of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}battle-hardened Commissar{/d}, the woman loses her rebellious spirit and lowers her head, suddenly pale. The sincerity of your anger serves as the best possible proof that you are right.{/n} "We're... traitors? Blessed Throne, is it really true? But we thought... What are we supposed to do now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}身为{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}久经沙场的政委{/d}，你自信的态度让那个女人震惊不已。她突然低下了头，脸色苍白，叛逆的思想荡然无存，因为你发自内心的愤怒便是你最好的证明。{/n}“我们是……叛徒？黄金王座在上，原来这才是真相吗？可我们以为……我们现在该怎么办？”

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Muharebe görmüş bir komiserin{/d} öz güveni karşısında sarsılan kadın, asiliğinden dönüp birden rengi atan suratını eğiyor. Öfkenin samimiliği, haklılığının en iyi ispatı olarak görev görüyor.{/n} "Hain olan... Biz miydik? Taht aşkına, bu doğru olabilir mi? Ama sanmıştık ki... Ne yapacağız biz şimdi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Staggered by the confidence of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}battle-hardened Commissar{/d}, the woman loses her rebellious spirit and lowers her head, suddenly pale. The sincerity of your anger serves as the best possible proof that you are right.{/n} "We're... traitors? Blessed Throne, is it really true? But we thought... What are we supposed to do now?"
